export default function App(){// game: stores the current game state (board, remaining adds)
const[game,setGame]=useState(null);// selectedCells: stores which cells the user has currently selected
const[selectedCells,setSelectedCells]=useState([]);// isLoading: true while the game is being initialized

const[soundOn,setSoundOn]=useState(true);// Toggle sound
const toggleSound=()=>{const newSoundOn=!soundOn;setSoundOn(newSoundOn);soundEffects.setMuted(!newSoundOn);};// Function to start a new game (used for both initial load and 'New Game' button)
const startNewGame=()=>{// Resume audio context on first interaction
soundEffects.resume();soundEffects.click();setIsLoading(true);setSelectedCells([]);startGame().then(data=>{setGame(data);setIsLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Failed to start game:",error);setIsLoading(false);});};// useEffect runs once when the component mounts (like componentDidMount)
useEffect(()=>{startNewGame();// Start a new game on first load
},[]);// empty dependency array: only run once
// Handles when a user clicks a cell on the board
const handleCellClick=(row,col)=>{// Validate board and indices to prevent errors
if(!game||!game.board||row<0||row>=game.board.length||col<0||col>=game.board[row].length||game.board[row][col]===null)return;// Resume audio context on first interaction
soundEffects.resume();// Create a unique key for the cell
const cellKey=`${row},${col}`;// Check if this cell is already selected
const isAlreadySelected=selectedCells.some(cell=>cell.key===cellKey);if(isAlreadySelected){// If already selected, unselect it
soundEffects.click();setSelectedCells(selectedCells.filter(cell=>cell.key!==cellKey));}else{// Play pop sound for selection
soundEffects.pop();// Otherwise, add it to the selection
const newSelected=[...selectedCells,{row,col,key:cellKey,value:game.board[row][col]}];if(newSelected.length===2){// If two cells are selected, try to remove them
const[cell1,cell2]=newSelected;if(canRemove(cell1,cell2)){// Play success sound
soundEffects.success();// Add success animation for selected cells
setSuccessCells([cell1.key,cell2.key]);setTimeout(()=>setSuccessCells([]),500);handleRemove([cell1.row,cell1.col],[cell2.row,cell2.col]);setSelectedCells([]);// Clear selection after attempt
}else{// Play error sound
soundEffects.error();// If not removable, trigger shake animation
setShakeBoard(true);setTimeout(()=>setShakeBoard(false),500);setSelectedCells([]);}}else{setSelectedCells(newSelected);}}};// Checks if two selected cells can be removed (same number or sum to 10)

const handleRemove=(pos1,pos2)=>{// Add fade out animation for cells being removed
const cell1Key=`${pos1[0]},${pos1[1]}`;const cell2Key=`${pos2[0]},${pos2[1]}`;setRemovedCells([cell1Key,cell2Key]);removeNumbers(game,pos1,pos2).then(data=>{// Play remove sound
soundEffects.remove();setGame(data);// Update the board with the new state
// Clear removed cells animation after a short delay
setTimeout(()=>setRemovedCells([]),300);// Check if game is won
if(data.game_won){// Play win sound
soundEffects.win();setTimeout(()=>alert("Game Win! ðŸŽ‰"),800);// Delay alert to let win sound play
}}).catch(async error=>{// If error, show a message and clear selection

});};// Handles the "Add Numbers" button (adds a new set of numbers to the board)
const handleAdd=()=>{// Resume audio context on first interaction
soundEffects.resume();soundEffects.click();// Request animation states from backend
addNumbers(game,true).then(data=>{if(data.animation&&data.states){// Handle animation states
animateAddNumbers(data.states);}else{// Fallback to immediate update (no animation)
setGame(data);}}).catch(error=>{console.error("Failed to add numbers:",error);// Fallback to non-animated version
addNumbers(game,false).then(data=>{setGame(data);});});};// Animate the placement of numbers step by step
const animateAddNumbers=animationStates=>{let currentStep=0;let animationTimeout=null;// Set a timeout to fallback to immediate add if animation takes too long
const fallbackTimeout=setTimeout(()=>{console.log("Animation timeout, falling back to immediate add");addNumbers(game,false).then(data=>{setGame(data);setNewNumbers([]);setEmptyCells([]);setIsExpanding(false);});},10000);// 10 second timeout
const animateStep=()=>{if(currentStep>=animationStates.length){// Clear timeout and animation state when complete

}else if(step.step==="place_number"){// Place number with animation
setGame(step.state);setIsExpanding(false);// Stop expanding animation when placing numbers
// Mark the newly placed number for drop-in animation
const newNumberKey=`${step.position[0]},${step.position[1]}`;setNewNumbers([newNumberKey]);// Play sound for number placement
soundEffects.pop();currentStep++;// Faster animation for number placement (100ms between each number)
animationTimeout=setTimeout(animateStep,100);}else if(step.step==="complete"){// Final state - ensure this is the complete state with all numbers
clearTimeout(fallbackTimeout);setGame(step.state);// Clear animation state
setNewNumbers([]);setEmptyCells([]);setIsExpanding(false);// Play completion sound

console.log("Animation complete. Final board state:",step.state.board);}};// Start animation
